graphics.title: YouTube Latin Grammys
graphics.text: Working with agency ObsidianWorks' team, I designed the event menus for YouTube's 2024 Latin Grammy Music & Culture Celebration.

graphics.title: Lewis Black
graphics.text: Lewis Black is an American stand-up comic known for his comical frustrations and takes on 'the absurdities of life.' As an intern at the Syndicate, I created concept YouTube video thumbnails for his page. Lewis and his team requested pops of vibrant color, big and blocky text, and the inclusion of his signature middle finger.

graphics.title: Uncle Vinnies Comedy Club
graphics.text:
Uncle Vinnies, once Ferrara's Ristorante, is currently a staple in Point Pleasant Beach, NJ. Having showcased professional comics such as Andrew DICE Clay, Jackie 'The Joke Man' Martling, Vic Di Bitetto, Robert Kelly and more, the comedy club has been noted as one of the best by Night & Day Magazine, Stepping Out, NJ Monthly and Asbury Park Press.

As a diversifying business, Uncle Vinnies requested the Syndicate make master flyer templates to reuse for their varying events. Below are general templates for meet and greets and special events hosted at Uncle Vinnies, as well as templates for events hosted by Uncle Vinnies but situated in other locations, such as Max's Es-ca.

graphics.title: Leave You Agog
graphics.text: A conceptual cover for a collection of songs by artists such as Jimi Hendrix, Thom Yorke, Kurt Cobain, Kim Deal, and more.

graphics.title: Adidas Mock Promotional Video
graphics.type: Video & Graphic Design - Photoshop, Premiere, Cubase Elements 12
graphics.text: Mock commercial for Adidas. Music by Ryan Sky Arizmendi.

graphics.title: Sounds
graphics.text: Album cover design and T-shirt mockup for Soleanna's tenth music mix.

graphics.title: Better Call Saul
graphics.text:
A concept promotional video for Better Call Saul.
Song - Tapioca Tundra, Mike Nesmith Acoustic Version
Sounds - Moulaythami and Julien Matthey from freesound.org

graphics.title: Take It To The Streets
graphics.text: Promotional flyer for a local fashion show in North Bergen, NJ, hosted by Emily Peguero and Pablo Ledesma in 2019.

graphics.title: Morph
graphics.text: Animation project over a postcard by Drew Michael Photography - Chicago Illinois.

graphics.title: CraftMix Mock Design
graphics.text: CraftMix is a healthy, convenient, and delicious alternative to the popular but sugar-filled cocktail mixers in the market. This rebranding project was primarily an exercise to practice my skills in 3D package design and dieline creation.

graphics.title: Moxie Brewery's Spunk Stout
graphics.text: Concept branding and marketing project that draws inspiration from the punk era. Beer can modeled and rendered in Blender.

graphics.title: Soleanna Run Club
graphics.text: Flyers for DJ Soleanna's newly formed runclub.

graphics.title: Dignitary
graphics.type: Graphic Design & Illustration - Hand Drawing, Illustrator, Photoshop
graphics.text: Dignitary, NJ-based hard rock and metal band, asked me to create the cover design for their upcoming album Underneath the Throggs Neck.

graphics.title: Sonic Youth Poster
graphics.text: Modernization of a 1996 Sonic Youth Daydream Nation Tour flyer.

graphics.title: Minolta Mock Promotional Video
graphics.type: Video Editing, Typography & 3D Animation - Illustrator, AfterEffects, Blender
graphics.text:
A modern concept promo for the camera manunfacturing company Minolta, now Konica Minolta. Custom Minolta font and backtrack created by Ryan Arizmendi. Camera models:
Minolta X-300: Radovan Stastny https://sketchfab.com/radovan_stastny
Rox Branded Konica: Fuji https://sketchfab.com/fujisan
Minolta X-570: Michael Emory Cerquoni https://sketchfab.com/nebadon2025

graphics.title: Dragonette
graphics.text: As an intern at the Syndicate, I created these iterations of Dragonette's Tour Life Playlist on Spotify - a curation of songs Dragonette listened to for the simple sake of listening.

photography.title: Doors
photography.text: Doors collected through digital and film photography, born from the notion that doors are more the windows to a home than the windows themselves.
